== LINKED SENSORY NUCLEI ==
(generated)

  * *Hindbrain Myelencephalon*
   * [BrainRegionBMA_HM_ACU Accessory Cuneate Nucleus,BMA.HM.ACU]: receives input from cervical spinal nerves and transmits that information to cerebellum; TRACTS={cuneocerebellar tract}
   * [BrainRegionBMA_HM_CU Cuneate Nucleus,BMA.HM.CU]: Carry fine touch and proprioceptive information from upper body; TRACTS={fasciculus cuneatus tract}
   * [BrainRegionBMA_HM_GR Gracile Nucleus,BMA.HM.GR]: Carry epicritic, kinesthetic, and conscious proprioceptive information from lower body; TRACTS={fasciculus gracilis tract}
   * Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM
    * [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HM.TGM.STR]: Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception; TRACTS={anterior trigeminothalamic tract}
  * *Hindbrain Metencephalon*
   * Trigeminal Nucleus of Pons,HMA.HP.PTP
    * [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR Principal Trigeminal Nucleus,HMA.HP.PTP.PTR]: Facial Somatic Sensations; TRACTS={dorsal trigeminal tract}
  * *Spinal Cord*
   * Lateral Horn/Funiculus,BMA.SC.LH
    * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LCV Lateral Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LCV]: Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR; TRACTS={spinocervical tract}
    * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_LH_LSN Lateral Spinal Nucleus,BMA.SC.LH.LSN]: Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions; TRACTS={spinohypothalamic tract; spinosolitary tract; tract of Lissauer}
   * Posterior/Dorsal Horn,BMA.SC.PH
    * Lamina I,BMA.SC.PH.L1
     * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_MG Marginal Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.MG]: Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation; TRACTS={lateral spinothalamic tract; spinomesencephalic tract; tract of Lissauer}
    * Lamina II,BMA.SC.PH.L2
     * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_SG Substantia Gelatinosa,BMA.SC.PH.SG]: Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation; TRACTS={anterior spinothalamic tract; lateral spinothalamic tract}
    * Lamina III, IV,BMA.SC.PH.L34
     * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_NP Proprius Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.NP]: Relay light touch, pain and temperature information; TRACTS={spinocervical tract; spinoolivary tract; spinotectal tract}
    * Lamina V, VI,BMA.SC.PH.L56
     * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_PH_CL Clarke Nucleus,BMA.SC.PH.CL]: Unconscious Proprioception; TRACTS={dorsal spinocerebellar tract}
   * Intermediate Zone,SC.IZ
    * Lamina VII,SC.IZ.L7
     * [BrainRegionBMA_SC_IZ_CCV Central Cervical Nucleus,BMA.SC.IZ.CCV]: Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills; TRACTS={rostral spinocerebellar tract; spinoolivary tract; spinovestibular tract}
     * [BrainRegionAVA_SC_IZ_IMM Intermediomedial Nucleus,AVA.SC.IZ.IMM]: Visceral sensory; TRACTS={spinomedulloreticular tract; spinopontoreticular tract; ventral spinocerebellar tract}
